data.title: 100+ General Knowledge Questions and Answers
data.meta_description: Find the best questions for checking general knowledge. Check the knowledge of your students or just website visitors with a simple quiz.
data.text:
General Knowledge Questions and Answers

We all once pass an IQ test or just a quiz with general knowledge questions. Human beings always want to check their knowledge in general. Maybe it is a way to develop self-confidence or just a fun way to repeat what they have learned at school. The studies show that the “gk questions with answers” keyword is on top of the Google search. So, we can make the following conclusion, if you are looking for a way to increase your website traffic and get more website visitors with just one quiz, then the gk questions in English are the best solution for you.

But we also know that although designing a quiz is fun, creating questions may be a little bit boring and time-consuming. That is why we have decided to provide you with more than 100 general knowledge questions and answers so that you can use them in your quizzes and engage your audience with well-designed questions.

You can make use of the below-displayed questions and create a quiz, which will compete with the most popular general knowledge trivia quizzes on the whole internet or even add the questions to your LMS plugins, such as Fox LMS and check the users' knowledge there as well.

100+ general knowledge questions and answers

1. In what year did the Great October Socialist Revolution take place?

1917

1923

1914

1920

Correct Answer: a

2. What is the largest lake in the world?

Baikal

Lake Superior

Ontario

Wrapping Up!

If you have decided to create a general knowledge quiz from scratch, this article can be an assistant for you, as here you can find more than 100 gk questions with their correct answers. No need to search for them in the books, or pass various quizzes to find the needed questions for you. Simply copy the given questions and paste them on your quiz. To create a simple quiz with these questions, you can use the WordPress quiz plugin, which has all the needed features to create an assessment quiz to check your students or just website visitors' knowledge.

How to Create Quiz From Scratch
